page.title: 02GENERAL IMPRESSION-PITSFORD
page.content: HOUSING IN THIS VILLAGE IS MOSTLY OWNER OCCUPIED WITH A PREPONDERANCE OF PERIOD AND EXPENSIVE PROPERTIES. A FAIRLY SMALL PLOT OF LAND IN THE REGION OF 0.2 ACRE MAY BE EXPECTED TO REALISE AROUND Â£13,000 WHILST THE AVERAGE PRICE IN A POORER AREA COULD BE AROUND Â£10,000 FOR A SIMILAR PLOT. THIS SIZE OF PLOT WOULD ONLY ACQUIRE PLANNING PERMISSION FOR A SINGLE DWELLING IN A VILLAGE LIKE PITSFORD WHERE THE HOUSING DENSITY IS FAIRLY LOW AND CONTROLLED. IN AN URBAN AREA THE DENSITY MAY WELL BE HIGHER SO THAT MORE THAN ONE DWELLING MAY BE ERECTED ON THIS SIZE OF PLOT. MANY HOUSES IN PITSFORD SELL FOR Â£80,000 OR MORE AND THERE ARE FEW AVAILABLE IN THE AVERAGE Â£30,000 CATEGORY. THERE ARE SOME COUNCIL OWNED HOUSES AVAILABLE AS RENTED ACCOMMODATION.
